channel.title: How could i add Cash Bags or extend my money allowed on server?
channel.description: i was wondering how could we add a cash bag to hold 2b rsps gold? like other serers have or how could i make itso i could have more than only 2000,000,000 Gp in my rsps server?

item.title: How could i add Cash Bags or extend my money allowed on server?
item.dc:creator: @xDizzay xDizzay
item.description:
@xDizzay wrote:

I Yaa I:

make it so when you use a raw herring on a tree it gives you 200m

LOLOLOLOLOL!

Read full topic

item.title: How could i add Cash Bags or extend my money allowed on server?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:18, topic:393173”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=490343.msg3586652#msg3586652 date=1304227552]
If you honestly want to raise the max from 2.1 bill to i think around 9.1 trill or something, then youd have to turn it into a 64 bit integer, something like that, i remember seeing it somewere…
[/quote]

Would also need to be client side modifications because it reads an int.[/quote]
Yeah…

And there were tons of questions like this if you search it here…

EDIT

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Turns out you cant(According to these older topics), i guess, so some kind of storage or starting a new stack is your only option.

Read full topic

item.title: How could i add Cash Bags or extend my money allowed on server?
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:14, topic:393173”][quote author=CookieScape link=topic=490343.msg3585932#msg3585932 date=1304187313]

Declare

BagAmount = 0;

Then when he uses the money on the bag make it

BagAmount += itemamount;

Or

He can not be a fucking moron and make items cost more than the money you can hold.

This.
[/quote]

no no no, its this:

[quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=490343.msg3585825#msg3585825 date=1304179925]
why don’t you just lower all the items costs?
[/quote][/quote]

You are correct, sir.

Read full topic

item.title: How could i add Cash Bags or extend my money allowed on server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Implement a banking system for storing the gold and use a existing item for withdraws. This will also will need a additional option to the banker dialogue menu to add another option where you can choose withdraw,deposit, and balance. The saving system could mock the inventory saving if you know how its handled.

Read full topic

item.title: How could i add Cash Bags or extend my money allowed on server?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

joelx617:

noi need to gt money bags or bags o one or cash bags whatever they called in my server to store money? could someone help me?

Hmm, I suppose that you could just check if Coins are used on a large rune ess bag, then it sets a value. Although, you would have to continuously add variables for more bags.

Why do you need more than 2 Billion?
